item.title: Kadima | Would you end a 10 year relationship? 302 |
item.description:

Is honesty absolutely necessary in a relationship? Let's hear from Kelly Ann and Richie.

item.title: Kadima | Would you end a 10 year relationship? 303 |

Kadima | Would you end a 10 year relationship? 303 |

For this segment, let's take it to the streets of St. George's for some relationship advice.

item.title: Kadima | Would you end a 10 year relationship? 304 |

Kadima | Would you end a 10 year relationship? 304 |

Richie and Kelly Ann give us final suggestions on how to save a relationship on the rocks.

item.title: Kadima | How to end a relationship 203 |
item.description:
Kadima | How to end a relationship 203 |

It's time for our favourite segment of the show: Street Talk. Let's hear what the people have to say.

item.title: Kadima | How to end a relationship 201 |
item.description:
Kadima | How to end a relationship 201 |

Welcome to episode 2 guys! Today's topic might bring up some bitter-sweet memories but we gotta deal with the past in order to move forward. So if you're suffering from a bad breakup or want to know how to end a relationship right now, stay tuned!

item.title: Kadima | How to end a relationship 202 |
item.description:
Kadima | How to end a relationship 202 |

The most important thing about ending a relationship is keeping your emotions check. In this segment, we discuss how to be strong in mind when it comes to matters of the heart.

item.title: Kadima | How to end a relationship 204 |
item.description:
Kadima | How to end a relationship 204 |

Here are Richie's and Kelly Ann's final thoughts and advice on how to end a relationship.

item.title: Kadima | Flirting 102 |
